We're an understanding bunch, we just want to know why. https://t.co/yBdiMmY6Ag

@Laura_James88 @RedIndustries2 Hi Laura hopefully you're also reporting on the toxic fumes nightmare that residents are living through because of the @WalleysL landfill site. @RedIndustries2 have been found in breach of permits by the @EnvAgency but residents continue to inhale toxic H2S fumes daily
@Tus_M_

urls.description: The Environment Agency's four monitoring units are due to be removed in August

urls.title: 'You're hit with this bad egg smell' Walleys Quarry protesters stage fresh demo
urls.description: They were outside the gates of Walleys Quarry from 9am today

urls.title: Life in UK's stinkiest village where families fear being 'poisoned in own homes'
urls.description: Residents say the nasty smell from Walleys Quarry is so unpleasant it burns the back of the throat while others have reported headaches, asthma attacks, stress, anxiety and sleeplessness

tweets.text:
Cigarette butts are among the most commonly discarded pieces of waste globally.

#CommitToQuit¬†- ¬†save your #health ‚ô•Ô∏è & the #environment üå≥ #WNTD2021 https://t.co/TG25p7jX9D

@a_merrydew @EnvAgencyMids Hi Aimee, we are definitely planning more events. As soon as possible they'll be in person but if necessary we'll run another virtual one. 

A recording / transcript of this week's will be available afterwards so you'll also be able to see if someone else has asked your question.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids So how will this work @ClareDinnisEA? You talk down the phone at us for 20 minutes then a select few get to ask a question? Why not zoom? Better still we are organising our own community meeting, why not just come and speak to the people in person?

@scottdegg @SianieRoo @UHNM_NHS @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @MattHancock @pow_rebecca @BorisJohnson He'll probably deny it , or use the old "we're doing all we can " phrase that @EnvAgency trot out every time .

tweets.text: Last Friday I reported the smell in Basford via the @EnvAgency website, but still no reference number.  Are these reports even being properly recorded? #stopthestink

@JuliaBradbury @Laura_James88 @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgency Thank you for pushing on with this Julia. It really is difficult expressing just how horrific this situation is. It impacts me everyday. It actually sticks to material so I often smell it on my furniture even when it doesn‚Äôt smell in the air! It‚Äôs absolutely foul. #stopthestink

We‚Äôre holding a #covidsafe #community session on Wed 26 May to answer residents‚Äô questions & give you the latest on regulation of #WalleysQuarry. 

Details on how to join below üëá

We‚Äôll also make the session available afterwards for those who can‚Äôt join on the day. https://t.co/njxpZMmOOL

tweets.text:
The join up between @EnvAgency scientists, water companies, government, public health officials and academics has had a real impact against COVID-19. 

We can learn a huge amount about community health from wastewater monitoring, and the benefits will last for years to come. https://t.co/OK4L7hnGPJ

tweets.text: Came to Lyme Valley Park with my son and had to leave due to strong landfill gas circulating at park and playground. What on earth is going on in this country where no authority or govt seem to have any desire to help us? @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

Our fisheries enforcement officers have been patrolling with @AnglingTrust volunteers in the Burton-upon-Trent area. This angler was legal.

As it is the coarse fishing close season, check where to #fish https://t.co/zwSPiVpaFb and how to buy a licence https://t.co/fx78bFkqgo https://t.co/UnOfCxOKDZ

tweets.text: A community in Staffordshire are living with doors & windows taped up.Nose bleeds, breathing issues, toxic fumes from the landfill site @WalleysL run by @RedIndustries2  The @EnvAgency have found the company  'in breach' but v little action #socialjustice  https://t.co/DehURqq0oi

urls.title: ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs terrifying‚Äô: the English village overwhelmed by landfill stink | Landfill | The Guardian
urls.description: For miles around Walleys Quarry near Newcastle-under-Lyme, people have reported waking up in the night struggling to breathe

tweets.text: The Hebden Bridge #flood siren will be tested today between 2pm & 3pm. The siren should be treated seriously if sounded at any other time. The testing of the siren is weather dependant, if the @EnvAgencyYNE needs to cancel the test we will let you know. https://t.co/SZyKwKyCUM

tweets.text: It is not getting any better. The gas stink from the landfill is increasing in intensity. A dreadful weekend and again tonight. No one should have to live like this. We are all looking for answers from @EnvAgencyMids and light at the end of this tunnel. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/JPdHJZJBqQ

Fisheries Enforcement Officers are continuing patrols in the #Burton on Trent area to check for out of season anglers. Remember: coarse #fish closed season runs until the 15 June so check where to fish https://t.co/zwSPiVpaFb https://t.co/ZrtSChC7oC

This month, the Yorkshire Flood Resilience team at @EnvAgency & @EnvAgencyYNE have created two new Flood Warning Areas covering 79 properties and businesses, aiming to better prepare communities for flooding events ‚òîÔ∏è https://t.co/Q7Kh7JRMuF

It‚Äôs #INNSweek! Floating Pennywort is a non-native species which spreads throughout a watercourse rapidly and causes issues with navigation and water quality. We‚Äôve been out in #Leicester to monitor its spread and target effective treatment on the River Soar @InvasiveSp https://t.co/bzzQJxx68K
@JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency Julia, you‚Äôre a star. Thank you
@BorisJohnson @MattHancock @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @PHE_uk @EnvAgency https://t.co/n2vqMyAl4w

tweets.text: The air in my house is thick with landfill fumes tonight. Again. There‚Äôs nowhere to hide from it. You cannot expect us to keep living like this @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe #WalleysQuarry #StopTheStink

If we were in the USA, their EPA would have advised staying indoors and protecting the elderly and children when the H2S from #WalleysQuarry hit its peak over just ten minutes. I wonder how they'd respond to repeated exposure over months @EnvAgency 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/NDvQCA2BSO

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids About time! We want hear about actions though, not words and more delay.

üá™üá∫ üá¨üáß Plastic straws, balloons and party poppers üéà
These can all impact on the environment. Next time you‚Äôre celebrating, try out more sustainable items. Watch this @EnvAgency #WorldOceanDay film for schools to find out more  
#preventingplasticpollution #sourcetosea https://t.co/04I2rbqwxh

We were out with @kentpolicerural & @AshfordCouncil in #Ashford #Kent checking that waste collectors had the correct paperwork.

When hiring someone to take your waste away, check they are registered with the @EnvAgency at https://t.co/29zfaL1G7i https://t.co/EQa7OYiRWN

Big thank you to @OliverHarmarEA Yorkshire area director @EnvAgencyYNE for helping to make a new video with partners about our #NFM in #Calderdale project.

Don't miss him introducing it at our #Confluence2021 Plenary event on Tuesday 8 June.
https://t.co/QXNOqg9F3w @Calderdale https://t.co/Xj1BjnWsTx

urls.title: Confluence 2021- open for registration ‚Äì Yorkshire Integrated Catchment Solutions Programme (iCASP)

tweets.text: @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 The gasses are pungent and offensive to mind and body, but also the sight/ site of it is horrendous. This beautiful country town has been sanctioned by @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK as a waste site. @KeeleUniversity suffers, the people of @NewsNBC suffer. Visit us ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

Community of #NewcastleUnderLyme invited to an online engagement event on Weds 26 May at 4pm

If you're affected by odour from #WalleysQuarry it's a chance to find out about our regulation of the site, ask us questions & for us to hear from you

Details ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/2RIZhtFy3Z https://t.co/EuQy5giryf

Great to see @nikkigammans & #volunteers feature on @bbcsoutheast talking about planting with the @EnvAgencySE on their seawalls in Pett Level, East Sussex. You can watch the short footage here: https://t.co/kuZErjqKOc #RareBumblebees #Bumblebee #Planting #Seawalls https://t.co/ENh4gRWeni
